steps.name: User login sandbox with the correct credentials
Fill the data in the lead page
Add the random name middle name and the last name
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Fill the data form dropdown to create lead
Click on save button
Get the unique id of the lead from the lead page
Validate the status of the lead after click on the lead that is inprocess or completed
logout from the account
User login sandbox with the correct credentials
globally search for the lead and click on the lead
Set the random eamil id
Wait unit the emailID Text is to be displyed
Set values in the dropdown without click on the save
Set the random mobile number
Click on save button
logout from the account
User login sandbox with the correct credentials
global search for the lead after the sales login
Updated the qulified lead
fill the values of the dropdown after the qulified lead
Set values in the dropdown without click on the save
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Add data in the dropdown after clcik on save and sang suggestions
Click on save button
Validate the lead status is able to show as 'converted lead'
global search for the lead name
Opporites text validate
